Class Heuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.AI.Heuristic

  • public class Heuristic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class in which there are all the methods used for the evaluation of a certain state
    Author:
    Arcangelo Alberico

    • Method Detail

      • evaluation

        public static double evaluation(State state,
                                State.Turn player)
        The evaluation function for the board state.
        Parameters:
        state - state to be evaluated
        player - player according which we have to calculate the heuristic
        Returns:
        the heuristic value of the given state

      • enemyPiecesAroundKing

        public static double enemyPiecesAroundKing(State state)
        Given a game state, this method returns a value used in board state evaluation which represents the number of enemy pieces surrounding the White king.

      • piecesInStrategicPos

        public static double piecesInStrategicPos(State state)
        Given a game state, this method returns a value used in board state evaluation for the number of black pieces in key strategic locations near the corners. These locations were determined to be useful for the Black in maintaining an advantage during the game.

      • kingInStrategicPos

        public static double kingInStrategicPos(State state)
        This method checks if the king is in a crutial position in order to win the game. Given the state the moethod checks if the king is into an escape row or column, then checks if thath row or column hasn't any other pawns and if the king in that position is threatened from any black pawn.
